title: Ucy
author: Ucy
created_time: May 22, 2022, 10:51:19 AMLast edit: May 22, 2022, 11:03:25 AM by Ucy
content: It's about control, not really so called Great Replacement(replacement of whites or something like that with other races). In the Matrix system, artificial environments are more controlled by those who built the system. It's like a zoo, then moving animals from their natural environments to zoos because zoos are more controlled. I will advice you to start planning to move from cities (or artificial environments) to natural environments to avoid being fully controlled in the future like animals in zoos

comments.author: Crpyto hunter
comments.body: Why so many people choose to move from their home town to cities,It when they've responsibility ahead of them to see. An when they've challenges or education might open the eye people to no about business that can brings money to the society orh an environment,Like sending a child to a university he/her can come out to no another trade out if what he/her went to learn in the school, It good when do many people might deside to go out to learn a trade and come to develop in a certain area,  why is that their knowledge will be at least greater than a person that is learning a trade in a local environment.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Crpyto hunter on May 25, 2022, 06:39:19 PMWhy so many people choose to move from their home town to cities,It when they've responsibility ahead of them to see. An when they've challenges or education might open the eye people to no about business that can brings money to the society orh an environment,Like sending a child to a university he/her can come out to no another trade out if what he/her went to learn in the school, It good when do many people might deside to go out to learn a trade and come to develop in a certain area,  why is that their knowledge will be at least greater than a person that is learning a trade in a local environment. What you are saying is not exactly what I mean in my post... it's a little similar though considering the fact that people typically move alot from places that are rural in nature in search of better opportunities in other societies, or some would immediately start contributing to the societies they are moving to. I actually believe this rural areas or places like that can survive well on their own (to be independent and successful) and live sustainably. For this to be possible, you need to allow people to be what their CREATOR created them to be, then the people will have different problems they are better/unique at solving, or different roles they are made for or are better at fulfilling. This people will need to be trained by those doing well who share thesame abilities/talents/gifts with them, probably via apprenticeship with moderate/basic Math, Civic, health education, religion, language/grammar, etc in the education. What ever problem that needs to be solved in a society, you should have people who are specially designed to solve the problem well. Look for them and have them developed by those above them and put them in their right department to solve the problems they know how to solve well.  I think you can succeed in developing a safe and successful independent society when you have a true leader designed by the CREATOR to properly develop a society according to HIS Will.
